placeholder.schema: Select or Create a new Schema definition

tooltip.path: url to use for this server. Both get & post will be enabled for this route
tooltip.launchgraphi: Launch Playground in a new window
tooltip.schema: GraphQL schema to use for this server. choose an existing schema or configure a new GraphQL schema
tooltip.graphi: enable or disable the built-in GraphQL Explorer interface. If enabled will be available at the specified path
tooltip.voyager: Launch GraphQL Voyager to explore the schema (opens in a new window)
tooltip.voyager_off: Voyager can be enabled by adding a property to settings file. Check node info.
tooltip.resolverstype: choose how to handle GraphQL queries
tooltip.timeout: timeout in milliseconds for resolver functions to return a response to client

errors.not-created: httpNode is disabled. httpNode must be enabled to create a GraphQL Server.
errors.missing-path: node enpoint is not defined. Define an endpoint for this GraphQL Server.
errors.noresolver: No resolver function defined for this type.
errors.timeout: Resolver function "__fieldPath__" timed out after __timeout__ seconds. Do you have a flow to resolve queries for "__fieldPath__" ?
